text: Not Fade Away may refer to: ==Film== * Not Fade Away (film), a 2012 film directed by David Chase ==Literature== * Not Fade Away, a play by Richard Cameron * Not Fade Away, a novel by Jim Dodge ==Music== ===Albums=== * Not Fade Away (Nitty Gritty Dirt Band album), a 1992 album by the Nitty Gritty Dirt Band * Not Fade Away (Remembering Buddy Holly), a 1996 tribute album * Not Fade Away (David Kitt album), a 2006 album by David Kitt ===Songs=== * "Not Fade Away" (song), a 1957 song by Buddy Holly, covered by many others ==Television episodes== * "Not Fade Away" (Angel), the series finale * "Not Fade Away" (Fear the Walking Dead) * "Not Fade Away" (Hercules: The Legendary Journeys)
title: Not Fade Away
